item.title: Book Promotion: Rails Test Prescription
item.dc:creator: Victor Goff
item.content:encoded:
Book Promotion: Rails Test Prescriptions


Hello,

We are pleased to announce that we have scheduled a book promotion of "Rails Test Prescriptions" along with its author from 12 to 14 May 2009.

Full details:
Book Promotion: Rails Test Prescriptions


  • Period: 12th to 14th May 2009
  • Details.
  • About the author Noel Rappin
  • Registrations have started. Anyone interested in Ruby programming can join. It is FREE. Use Enrollment key:BPCE101.
  • Join here.
  • You can start posting your questions related to the book, immediately.
You can win a printed copy of this book if you post intelligent questions related to the topics of the book in the relevant forum. Why wait? It's free. Do join.
The previous book promotion of "Wicked Cool Ruby Scripts'" was a big success.
In case you want to delete your account on RubyLearning, send me an email at mail@satishtalim.com
Thanks, Satish
